descriptionHTML:
Custom watch face for Android Wear(Watch)

Features
- Awesome designer's stylish watch face for you.
- Simple but useful design face! Designed by professional designer.
- Privileges for initial release
Both packaged.
1.Rectangle design for Samsung Gear Live,G Watch
2.Round design for Moto360

More watch faces
- Visit our exclusive watchface collections for Android Wear on the Play Store
http://goo.gl/58kqxS

For Android 6.0(and higher) phone users
Need to do following setup procedure after installation.
http://androidwearface.com/for_android6_users/

Sub clocks
(from left)
- Day of week gauge
- Month gauge
- Date gauge
Installation
It will be installed on your watch automatically from your phone paired with your watch after a short time and please wait.
After installation,you can choose the watch face from the setting menu.
Or just long tap on the current watch face screen,so watch face selector screen will open.

Please note
- If you don't like this model please cancel your order in 15 minutes. And try another watch face.

This watchface is designed for Android Wear Rectangle Watch like following devices.
- ZenWatch (ASUS)
- Gear Live (SAMSUNG)
- G Watch (LG)
- SmartWatch3 (SONY)

Tested with LG G Watch,Samsung Gear Live

*Smartphone and Android Wear must be paired before you use it.

More watch faces
- Visit our exclusive watchface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
http://goo.gl/RITByg

[NOTICE]
If you have a question,plsease contact our email address in English.
comments: I like it Really a nice watch face tells me everything that I need to know

Gorgeous I hate watch faces which look great when on but look awful when the watch goes dim.. this one stays looking gorgeous in both states.. it looks great and I haven't noticed any increase in battery drainage than usual. This may be because I prefer watch faces with full colour when dim. Love it.

Rework the dimmed display I'm giving you a 4 because I really like the watch face design, but the dimmed display kills the battery life. I'd like to see the dimmed display greatly refined or I would like to uninstall and receive a refund because I can't use as is.
Eats Battery One of the nicer watch faces but it will destroy your battery. Maybe it's because of the use of colour during sleep mode?
I like it but... Seeing that the date is at the top it would be great if the weather was integrated somehow and Aldo if it could be completely dimmed to a black and white screen once sleeping...
